data.message: Thanks again Facebook because you won't actually put things in chronological order I missed out on something. Most recent isn't chronological order. If someone comments on the a post that same post is jumped to the top again! No it should stay where it was. I get more time correct information from Twitter! Please fix.

replies.message: Hey Rachel. We've invested a lot to understand how News Feed can show the most engaging content to the majority of people. Top Stories is the result of our findings, which is why it is the default. We know that some people prefer the Most Recent view, so we've kept this option available. If you have specific thoughts you want to share, please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1rmVirO -Hailey
